reviewText:
Most of the prints are pretty awful however what I like is a look into turn of last century ways.  The sceneyou can see why! ry and interiors are interesting.  Some of the films are better than others.  For example, Syd Chaplin is a poor and fey version of Charlie. You can completely understand why he opted to become his brother's manager.

The really good film is Larry Semon's.  He had full control of his films and there are some elaborate action scenes and explosions that cost a pretty penny to do.  That was his ultimate downfall and
